info.title: PRA Division of Interest
info.description:
The service contains Division of Interest, Bearer Group, Bearer, Tax State exemption, Ownership, Owner History, Funds Transfer, Marketing exemption, Sliding scale header, Sliding scale items, Funds transfer header and Funds transfer items nodes.

Once the Bearer Group, Bearer, Tax State exemption, Ownership, Owner History, Funds Transfer, Marketing exemption, Sliding scale header, Sliding scale items and Funds transfer items is created and respective identification numbers are returned.

x-sap-shortText: Create Production and Revenue Division of Interest using this synchronous inbound service

values.text: [Revenue Accounting - Oil and Gas Production(5NM)](https://me.sap.com/processnavigator/SolP/5NM " Link To BP ")
Production Revenue Accounting Division Of Interest
